i18n.title: Convert Object to Iterable Pairs
i18n.description: In this lab, we will be exploring a JavaScript function called 'toPairs', which creates an array of key-value pair arrays from an object or other iterable. Through this lab, we will learn how to use this function to convert various data structures into a format that is more easily manipulated and accessed. We will also gain a deeper understanding of the concepts of iterators and iterable objects in JavaScript.

meta.title: JavaScript Function | Data Conversion | Iterable Objects
meta.description: Explore the JavaScript 'toPairs' function to convert various data structures into key-value pair arrays. Learn about iterators and iterable objects in this programming tutorial.
meta.keywords: JavaScript, toPairs, data conversion, iterable objects, programming tutorial

verify.name: Verify Node Commands Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 将对象转换为可迭代键值对
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探索一个名为“toPairs”的JavaScript函数，它会从一个对象或其他可迭代对象创建一个键值对数组的数组。通过这个实验，我们将学习如何使用这个函数将各种数据结构转换为更易于操作和访问的格式。我们还将更深入地理解JavaScript中的迭代器和可迭代对象的概念。

meta.title: JavaScript函数 | 数据转换 | 可迭代对象
meta.description: 探索JavaScript的“toPairs”函数，将各种数据结构转换为键值对数组。在本编程教程中了解迭代器和可迭代对象。
meta.keywords: JavaScript, toPairs, 数据转换, 可迭代对象, 编程教程

verify.name: 验证Node命令的用法
verify.hint: 在终端/SSH中，通过输入'node'并按下回车键，可以运行JavaScript。
